wiki.text:
'Giving' may refer to:

* Gift, the transfer of something without the expectation of receiving
  something in return
* Generosity, the habit of giving freely without expecting anything in return
* Charity (practice), the giving of help to those in need who are not related
  to the giver
* [[Giving: How Each of Us Can Change the World]], a book by Bill Clinton
* ''Giving'' (album), an album by Colm Ó Snodaigh
wiki.title: giving
